50#ifndef UART_STREAM_COMMON_H
51#define UART_STREAM_COMMON_H

57
58#define NUM_UARTS_USED 1
59
60#if defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART0_TX) && defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART0_RX)
61#define UART0_AVAIL 1
62#else
63#define UART0_AVAIL 0
64#endif
65#if defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART1_TX) && defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART1_RX)
66#define UART1_AVAIL 1
67#else
68#define UART1_AVAIL 0
69#endif
70#if defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART2_TX) && defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART2_RX)
71#define UART2_AVAIL 1
72#else
73#define UART2_AVAIL 0
74#endif
75#if defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART3_TX) && defined(AM_BSP_GPIO_UART3_RX)
76#define UART3_AVAIL 1
77#else
78#define UART3_AVAIL 0
79#endif
80
81//
84//
85typedef enum
86{
87#if UART0_AVAIL
88 eUART0,
89#endif
90#if UART1_AVAIL
91 eUART1,
92#endif
93#if UART2_AVAIL
94 eUART2,
95#endif
96#if UART3_AVAIL
97 eUART3,
98#endif
99 eMAX_UARTS,
100 euidX32 = 0x70000000, // force this to 32bit value on all compilers
101}
102uart_id_e;
103
104#if defined(AM_BSP_UART_STREAM_UART)
105 #define UART_ID AM_BSP_UART_STREAM_UART // use the bsp requested uart for this
106#else
107 #warning "No AM_BSP_UART_STREAM_UART defined in the BSP"
108 #if defined(UART2_AVAIL) && (UART2_AVAIL > 0)
109 #define UART_ID 2 // want to default to uart2 is it is defined in the BSP
110 #else
111 #define UART_ID 0
112 #endif
113#endif

120#define RX_BUFFER_SIZE (1024 * 8)

126//

131}
